{"id":1505442286,"question_id":3517,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1736625662,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"46 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1505442286/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Distance After Road Addition Queries I","memory":"70.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> shortestDistanceAfterQueries(int n, vector<vector<int>>& queries) {\n        //queries[i] = [ui, vi] represents the addition of a new unidirectional road from city ui to city vi. \n        //After each query, you need to find the length of the shortest path from city 0 to city n - 1\n        //answer[i] is the length of the shortest path from city 0 to city n - 1 after processing the first i + 1 queries.\n        vector<int> ans;\n        vector<vector<int>> adj(n);\n        vector<int> dist(n);\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++)\n            dist[i] = i;\n        for(int i=0; i<n-1; i++)\n            adj[i].push_back(i+1);\n        for(auto query:queries) {\n            int a = query[0], b = query[1];\n            adj[a].push_back(b);\n            if(dist[a]+1<dist[b]) {\n                queue<int> q;\n                q.push(b);\n                dist[b] = dist[a]+1;\n                while(!q.empty()) {\n                    int cur = q.front();\n                    q.pop();\n                    for(auto nxt: adj[cur]) {\n                        if(dist[cur]+1<dist[nxt]) {\n                            dist[nxt] = dist[cur]+1;\n                            q.push(nxt);\n                        }\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n            ans.push_back(dist.back());\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-distance-after-road-addition-queries-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
